page.title: 14Littlesea Caravan Park.
page.content: {Littlesea Caravan Park}is one of the many{holiday parks in Weymouth.}You would find it at the end of{Lynch {Lane.}It has a large number of {caravans and a tent park}where you can come and camp in your own tents. The caravans are split up into fields, Green, Red, Blue etc.The{entertainment for children is very good.There is a playground where{Crazy Golf and {trampolines}are.There is also a{Bouncy {Castle.}There is a{mini fair ground where there are{free rides, donkeys {and stalls. The{swimming pools}are good fun. It has a{water slide}and a normal slide which goes into different pools. There is also a{small heated pool}for children. For the adults there is a {bar and club at night.}There is a {supermarket}and a{gift shop}to buy souvenirs. Clare Barnes Amy Finnie.
